content:
Sure, here's an updated version of the professional summary that reflects the changes you requested:

---

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Passionate and driven HR professional with experience in problem-solving and helping others. Skilled in providing quality service and support to clients. Currently finishing up an Allstate Apprenticeship in AskHR, gaining valuable experience in HR-related support. Knowledgeable in various HR areas, including company policies and procedures, HR information systems, and workforce management. Holds an AA degree from Kennedy King College and is pursuing a BA in HR/Accounting at Chicago State University.
